itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by legendary comedian Gilbert Gottfried to talk about how he found out he was fired from SNL and why he got fired from being the Aflack duck, the PC police ruining comedy, and him being the first person to tell a 9/11 joke.
